entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story. He is mentioned as someone who has a swooping sensation over him.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who gasps.

entities.name: xenophilius
entities.description: Xenophilius is the one who is sobbing and claiming that Harry Potter is present.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is mentioned as Xenophilius's daughter whom he wants to have back.

entities.name: selwyn
entities.description: Selwyn is the one who is talking to Xenophilius and asking him to bring down Harry Potter.

relationships.description: Selwyn is requesting Xenophilius to bring down Harry Potter in exchange for Luna.
Selwyn is demanding that Xenophilius brings down Harry Potter.
